<nowiki>[[http://www.jncasr.ac.in/pinakib|Pinaki Bhattacharya]]</nowiki> is a Lenovo Z61T user with Ubuntu Gutsy Gibbon 64-bit version installed on it.

His aim presently is to contribute to the documentation of the Ubuntu Community.

Pinaki has two years of experience of developing component software for the Engineering Automation industry. Unfortunately it included working on the Microsoft platform.

Presently, however, he is a PhD student of Mechanical Engineering at Purdue. His laptop and his work machine (an RH ia64 linux) are named <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balius_and_Xanthus|Balius and Xanthus]]</nowiki> respectively.
